review:
We really had a very warm experience, that was our first visit, we felt comfortable and convenient within no time. She is very friendly, calm and composed. Doctor’s demeanor has really put us at ease, we highly recommend Varalakshmi Madam.
Great doctor. *** ** ************** caring, expertise and informative. 

Overall experience at our first visit itself is excellent
